duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary contact and advocate for major partners, nurturing positive and encouraging relationships.
Lead the onboarding process for new partners, collaborating crossfunctionally to ensure smooth integration and management.
Plan, schedule, and manage project timelines, tracking deliverables and dependencies from kick-off through launch.
Utilize visual data tools to gather insights, track partner performance, and inform strategic decisions.
Cultivate and maintain relationships with partners, ensuring their success and satisfaction with our services.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
